title: 2D Jump ?n? Run (Easy Version Update)
briefDescription: A jump 'n' run in only 2D! (well, almost) Instead of a jump 'n' run in a 3-dimensional space, this one is 2-dimensional and looks ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A jump ?n? run in only 2D! (well, almost) Instead of a jump ?n? run in a 3-dimensional space, this one is 2-dimensional and looks like a slice of a typical Minecraft world.
You are starting at the bottom (the Nether) and your goal is to reach the top (the End). There are no checkpoints, so be careful!
If you want, you can try to find the 3 hidden nether stars inside some chests to unlock nothing.
And yes, you can walk on honey block-walls.

title: The World Parkour
briefDescription: Welcome to the World Parkour! This parkour is based on going from country to country, but something bad happens. This map has checkpoints, slime block ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Welcome to the World Parkour! This parkour is based on going from country to country, but something bad happens. This map has checkpoints, slime block jumps, ladder jumps, normal jumps. etc. There is one level where you can choose if you want to go the short way or a little bit longer way. Try out the map if you want a parkour warm-up! GLHF!

title: Hide And Go Edawg (Updated) 1.16 Bedrock
briefDescription: This was fun Hide and Seek map me my cousins worked on. It has tones hidden secrets and areas to explore. Plus lots of parkour ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This was fun Hide and Seek map me my cousins worked on. It has tones hidden secrets and areas to explore. Plus lots of parkour and some other mini games too like spleef, pig racing,shoot the minecart, Slap them off, connect 4, noughts and crosses (Tic Tac Toe), Foot Race, Isolation, Build Battle and Rock Paper Scissors.

Hide And Go Edawg
The reason why it is called hide and go edawg instead of hide and seek is because we originally built a similar map on a server called edawg and played it there (Server Ip for Java Players: EDAWG878.COM).

Rules of Hide and Go Edawg
Be welcome to play around with certain rules
Main rules of Hide and Go Edawg:
1)No ones allowed to break or place blocks in a match
2)Hider starts game with a knockback wooden sword (If you want to get rid of nametags you can effect the hider with invisibility and give them leather armour or trust the seekers to turn off nametags in their settings)
3)Seeker starts game with Enchanted diamond sword and armour, and a Glistering Melon (Glistering Melons can be used to enter the theme park)
4)Once a hider is found unless there is no hiders left that hider must become seeker.
5)If a Hider dies not from a seeker or a seekers wolf, they must tp back to the hider area (They do not become seeker)
6)The seeker goal is to kill all hiders
7)The Hider goal is to survive for as long as possible, but they can do one of these things.
1.Just Hide
2.Try and visit every area
3.kill a non afk seeker
Other gamemodes:
1.Try Playing the game but give every player and elytra and fireworks
2. Instead of hide and seek try doing survival games by having everyone tp to hider area and locate items around the map. (Have a time at the start where no one can pvp)
3.Try some of the minigames that can be located in spawn

title: Linear Graph Plotting Computer!
briefDescription: This is a computer that i have created to plot linear line graphs. It works by using the equation y=mx+c where y is ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a computer that i have created to plot linear line graphs. It works by using the equation y=mx+c where y is the y axis, x is the x-axis, m is the line gradinent (how much it increments x by) and c is the y-intercept or offset value.
This means if you input an equation for a line and start the computer, it calculates points on the graph and displays them on a 16 by 16 redstone lamp display.
This computer has 13 lines of code, 1.5 bytes or 3 cells of ram and a 4 bit adder and 3 bit multiplier ALU to power it.

title: Bedrock Auto Furnace and Smelter
briefDescription: This is my last upload today as im in progress of some custom terrains! But here it is, the automatic furnace and smelter! it is ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This is my last upload today as im in progress of some custom terrains! But here it is, the automatic furnace and smelter! it is crazily fast and has tons of storage underneath. I put gold ores in it and was producing 2 gold every second! so yh, you do the math ? Just fill this up with coal and your block of choice for smelting and sit back and relax while this does the hard work for you! Enjoy!

title: Fun Facts & Secrets in Minecraft

Here are some screenshots:

title: Infinite Blocks Cheats Off
briefDescription: I set this world up with command blocks to have blocks all around spawn that are infinite but cheats are still off, I put some ...

crawledImageUrls.text: I set this world up with command blocks to have blocks all around spawn that are infinite but cheats are still off, I put some god tools in a chest to help farm them all! There are lots of building materials so you can build anything you want or you can get armor, tools, and a sword to be ready to fight! I also added a Halloween building blocks section so you can make a cool Halloween world!

title: Noteblock Parkour
briefDescription: Play a quick parkour map made by RealMcMatthewPe! Features a Custom Lobby and Custom Background Music. This map is fun, has cool builds, and is ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Play a quick parkour map made by RealMcMatthewPe! Features a Custom Lobby and Custom Background Music. This map is fun, has cool builds, and is easy to complete no matter how bad your skills are! You can practice your skills by repeating the levels, and see how the map was made in Creative Mode once you complete it.
My map uses my favorite addon for background music called Minecraft Custom Music. The map has several jumps on ranges of difficulty levels and is inspired by Parkour Paradise. The map revolves around noteblocks, hints the name. We have new game-modes and maps! Try them out and see how much difficulty you can handle! If you finish ?HARDCORE Blackout? Write a comment and I will congratulate you!
Rules: No Cheating.
Here are some screenshots:

Had to make out of iron due to redstone issues, so my usual crying obsidian isnt there as much :'( but im happy with the result never the less! Enjoy ?

You dont even have to turn this bad boy on, just download, import and your off! Would be bigger and more output but due to lag issues, i wouldnt recommend it. Enjoy anyway!

title: HardCoreLine 2 Official Map
briefDescription: Have you seen the hit YouTube series HardcoreLine? Have you seen Permadeath and wanted to play it? Well, congratulations bro, you've come to the right ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you seen the hit YouTube series HardcoreLine?
Have you seen Permadeath and wanted to play it?
Well, congratulations bro, you?ve come to the right place. Built by MikeGsYT for the official series on YouTube created by AventurasIronKira.
Permadeath is a great project of the renowned ElRichMC, but logically its members are YouTubers or famous streamers, and it is also carried out in JAVA EDITION.
Well, the RevolucionLineSMP team has decided to bring this to the reality of Bedrock Edition to make our own series.
And since it has been a bit recognized in the community, we have made the decision to share the map that has caused so many deaths ..
It is an ordinary survival mode map, with the only difference that it is in ?HARDCORE? mode, so when you die you cannot spawn again.

To activate the ?HARDCORE? mode you must take the unobtainable items that are in the shulker near the spawn.
In this you will find two types of items:
-steve?s skull named ?muerte?
-steve?s skull named ?day +?
With the skull called ?muerte? the death of a player is detected.
If for any reason it is removed from the inventory, the player will die and be expelled from the world.
With the head called ?day +? you increase the days that are in the game, to keep a better control of the time played.
When a player dies or drops their unique item, they are teleported far away from the spawn of the world, a title notifies the other players of the death, and immediately afterwards, the player is expelled from the world while an infinite storm begins that gives effects to the hostile mobs, such as:
-Speed
-Strength
-Jump
-Invisibility
The map is 100% programmed so that when a death occurs there is a notification to the other players and a kick for the deceased.
At the moment only the change of 1 -3/30 is implemented
-1 inventory slot.
all hostile mobs are more hostile (all credits for the creator) Addon
there are mutant entities (all credits for the creator) Addon

title: The Fallen Kingdoms The New Awakens
briefDescription: The Fallen Kingdoms The New AwakensRule:2 team fight to the death RULE:To play, you need at least 2 opposing teams. The object of the game ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The Fallen Kingdoms The New Awakens
Rule:2 team fight to the death
RULE:To play, you need at least 2 opposing teams. The object of the game is to own the opponent?s vault room for more than a minute.
The game was invented by Zelvac. The first official season (Fallen kingdoms season 01 day 01) is with Unsterbliicher, Kigyar69 against IndyanaNatyu and Zelvac. The rules were the same as those listed below, with a few minor things:
? The bases were 30 times 30 in the original series
? No fault obligation in the wall
? There were objectives to complete: Have a wall of at least one block wide and five high; have a safe room; and two construction objectives (season 1: create an oasis and a pyramid; season 2 a mansion and a French garden, etc.)

title: Realm of Beturune: Generations
briefDescription: Realm of Beturune: Generations is an open world RPG adventure map. In this map you will fight mobs, solve puzzles, and explore a beautifully crafted ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Realm of Beturune: Generations is an open world RPG adventure map. In this map you will fight mobs, solve puzzles, and explore a beautifully crafted open world. Keep in mind that this map is a work in progress and more stuff will be added every update!
Keep in mind that this map is a W.I.P, and that more content is added every update.
Explore many different areas!
There are tons of secret dungeons around Beturune, find them and solve the puzzles inside to get some loot!
There are many dangers in Beturune, are you prepared to face them?

title: The City of Greendale Alpha v0.4.0: The Amusement Update! (Kind of?)
briefDescription: Welcome to the City of Greendale! Greendale is a City in which It will have a bunch of Shops, Services, Homes, and Much More! But ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to the City of Greendale! Greendale is a City in which It will have a bunch of Shops, Services, Homes, and Much More! But all those things will come in future updates, but there are still some there for you to see now! The city will be very diverse, as there will be everything from beaches to forests, and small wooden houses to gigantic skyscrapers!
NOTE: This City was a will be heavily inspired by the City of Newisle, the city of Blue Topia, and the city of Greenfield! (A java Map)
Many things will come to live and rest in Greendale, but here are some of the things that exist in Greendale at the Moment:

title: Land Strip PVP (2 Player Kit PVP Map)
briefDescription: Land Strip PVP is a 'Kit PVP' map made by; shamwarizim_, CrustaceanTP, and TheSfflux. As the name suggests, the map is a strip of custom ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Land Strip PVP is a ?Kit PVP? map made by; shamwarizim_, CrustaceanTP, and TheSfflux. As the name suggests, the map is a strip of custom built Minecraft terrain. There are currently only three kits; warrior, archer, and wizard, although we are planning on updating the map and adding new features and fixing bugs.

This is the spawn room. Inside the spawn room there are multiple buttons and settings to mess around with, combine, and try out. Along with potion effects there are also ?starter items? these items cannot be obtained from kits and must be selected from the starter item selection panels.
The Map
